name: Newt
description: Newt is an experimental microservice providing two stage data routing, form data validation, simple static file services. Newt can route data from a request to a JSON data source (e.g. Postgres+PostgREST) and then take the JSON results and run them through Pandoc server.
releaseNotes: This release is focused on providing SQL for bootstraping application built around Postgres+PostgREST and Pandoc. Two additional configuration attributes are namespace and models. Three types of SQL outputs are demonstrated, pg-setup SQL, pg-models SQL and pg-models-test SQL.
softwareRequirements: A front end web server supporting reverse proxy (e.g. Apache2, NginX)
